name: Apples for Harvest  PRINT
description:
Annalise picked some apples today, her own little harvest for autumn. Jams and crumble they will make she tells me, smiling sweetly in gratitude for all the earth gives.

The original painting was rendered by hand in watercolour. The print itself measures approximately 7” X 9” and is centred on 8½ “X 11” paper leaving a border for framing. Prints are done by me on Fine Art Watercolour Paper which is a beautiful, acid-free and archival. Images are printed using archival, fade-resistant, waterproof inks. 

Each print is carefully packaged in a cellophane sleeve and mailed in a protective mailer to ensure their safe arrival to their new owners.  All prints are signed and dated by me. The watermark will not appear on the print itself and the real print is sharp, clear and bright. 

If you like this print, you may like the ’Sweet for Fall ’, print also listed in the store.

Artwork & text, ©2010 Dyan A.Whyte and Where Ava Dreams. All rights reserved. 

Shipping:
Canada - $3.00/ .50c with another item
USA - $3.50/ .50c with another item
Everywhere Else - $5.00/ .50c with another item

name: Sweet for Fall PRINT
description:
Sweet for fall,
     The leaves are changing.
Sweet for fall,
     Wind fills the air.
Sweet for fall,
     Soon leaves will be gone
Fall so sweet, to be enjoyed
    shorter days passing as soon trees will be covered in snow.

The original painting was rendered by hand in watercolour. The print itself measures approximately 7” X 9” and is centred on 8½ “X 11” paper leaving a border for framing. Prints are done by me on Fine Art Watercolour Paper which is a beautiful, acid-free and archival. Images are printed using archival, fade-resistant, waterproof inks. This print has Avery and Aubree – two of thelittledolls.

Each print is carefully packaged in a cellophane sleeve and mailed in a protective mailer to ensure their safe arrival to their new owners.  All prints are signed and dated by me. The watermark will not appear on the print itself and the real print is sharp, clear and bright.
 
If you like this print, you may like the ’I Will Call You Friend ’, print also listed in the store.

Artwork & text, ©2010 Dyan A.Whyte and Where Ava Dreams. All rights reserved.

name: Always Friends PRINT Set
description:
thelittledolls amongst themselves are as thick as thieves – cozy little friends forever! This print set includes the ‘Let’s Eat Cake!’, ‘I Will Call You Friend’ and ‘Sweet for Fall’ prints. 

The original paintings were rendered by hand in watercolour. The prints themselves each measure approximately 7” X 9” and are centred on 8½ “X 11” paper leaving a border for framing. The set is carefully packaged in a cellophane sleeve and mailed in a protective mailer to ensure their safe arrival to their new owners.  All prints are signed and dated by me. The watermarks will not appear on the prints themselves and the real prints are sharp, clear and bright.

name: Lady Bug Girl & Skeleton Boy PRINT
description:
This year’s Halloween print has Aimee and Albert dressed up as ladybug and skeleton. Not too much fuss about what to wear with this sweet and easygoing pair and so cute in the end I think, don’t you?

The original painting was rendered by hand in watercolour. The print itself measures approximately 6” X 6” and is centred on 8½ “X 11” paper leaving a border for framing. Prints are done by me on Fine Art Watercolour Paper which is a beautiful, acid-free and archival. Images are printed using archival, fade-resistant, waterproof inks. 

Each print is carefully packaged in a cellophane sleeve and mailed in a protective mailer to ensure their safe arrival to their new owners.  All prints are signed and dated by me. The watermark will not appear on the print itself and the real print is sharp, clear and bright.

If you like this print, you may like the ’Let's Eat Cake ’, print also listed in the store.

name: Angels to Call Our Friends PRINT Set
description: This print set includes the ‘An Angel to Call Our Friend: Little Girls’ and ‘An Angel to Call Our Friends: Little Boys’ prints. I decided to include them both in a set after two of the little boys – Avery and Albert, decided that like Annalise and Esme(featured in the little girls set) they too had a special angel friend. The original paintings were rendered by hand in watercolour. The prints themselves each measure approximately 7” X 9” and are centred on 8½ “X 11” paper leaving a border for framing. Prints are done by me on Fine Art Watercolour Paper which is a beautiful, acid-free and archival. Images are printed using archival, fade-resistant, waterproof inks. The set is carefully packaged in a cellophane sleeve and mailed in a protective mailer to ensure their safe arrival to their new owners. All prints are signed and dated by me. The watermarks will not appear on the prints themselves and the real prints are sharp, clear and bright. Read more about each painting here and here! If you like this print set, you may like the ’My Very Own’, print also listed in the store. Artwork & text, ©2010 Dyan A.Whyte and Where Ava Dreams. All rights reserved.
